purpose: To provide a framework for developing and orchestrating multi-agent systems for complex AI tasks.
principle: Builds on agentic AI principles, enabling agents to collaborate and communicate effectively using a modular architecture.
reusability: Offers a modular framework with plug-and-play components, extensive API support, and integration capabilities with other AI systems.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may lack comprehensive documentation and stability, limited to Python ecosystem.

highlight: A comprehensive framework for building agentic AI systems with a focus on agent collaboration and orchestration.
